Instead of the usual three or four times, the vodka was distilled an infinite number of times. 100 years later, it was reintroduced as Absolut. Just as then, Absolut is produced in Ahus, L.O. This product is designed in such a way that prevents excessive foam accumulation inside the washing machine or in manual washing.","category_id":64,"custom_info":{"Applications":"This product is recommended for removing stains and very dirty clothes of different textures as well as formal and silk clothes and curtain.","Warning":"Keep away from direct sunlight and children.\r\nIf swallowed, consult a specialist.\r\nUse gloves for manual washing.","Directions For Use":"Hand washing: If clothes are washed manually appropriately, they will have a longer lifespan than machine washing. Rub the clothes manually for a few minutes and then rinse and dry. Soak the clothes further in the aqueous laundry solution in the case of further stains on clothes. Serve.\nTIP: 500 gms vegetables or 1 litre of ready dal needs 1-1\/2 tsp Garam Masala.\nDal, Samosa, Potato Vada, Kachori, Usal, Pattice, Patra and all types of farsans taste best with Everest Garam Masala."},"brand_name":"EVEREST","bullet_desc":["A perfect blend of pure spices","Everest is a quality and well known brand","Free of preservatives and artificial flavour enhancers","Everest does not use these synthetics","Specially formulated to impart the genuine taste to various Indian food preparations"],"nutrition":"","attribute":{"449":{"id":249,"merchant_product_code":"8901786101","product_id":404,"attribute_id":449,"store_id":2,"merchant_id":3,"price":"13.50","stock":2,"created_date":"2018-09-21 06:31:39","updated_date":"2020-06-24 17:37:16","attribute_name":"Garam Masala Powder","discount_type":"","discount_value":"0","unit":"gm","quantity":100,"actual_price":"13.50"}}},"405":{"product_id":405,"price":"12.50","product_name":"Garam Masala Powder","discount_type":"","discount_value":"0","product_desc":"Our Brand has varieties of items, all these are process in Ghana. {"status":"success","data":{"3849":{"product_id":3849,"price":"45.00","product_name":"Odex Bleach - Blue\/Regular Scent","discount_type":"","discount_value":"0","product_desc":"Odex cleans, disinfects, whitens and removes stains; use odex for cleaner whiter wash and for general cleaning and disinfection all around the house.","category_id":63,"custom_info":{"Active Ingredients":"Sodium Hypochlorite.","Caution":"Do not use odex with toilet bowl cleansers or other cleansers with ammonia. Doing so can release hazardous gases. Keep away from children's reach.","Directions For Use":"Clothes washing:\nTypes of fabrics you can bleach: cotton, linen, synthetics, permanent press and most colored fabrics that can be safely bleached. Do not use odex on silk, wool, mohair, leather, or non - fast colors. \nColor bleaching test: a quick, easy bleach test for colors, mix one tablespoon odex with 1\/4 cup water. Apply one drop of this solution to a hidden portion of fabric. Let stand for one minute, if there is no change in color, fabric can be safely bleached.\nAutomatic machine washing: one cup of odex per washing machine load with good laundry detergent should provide excellent cleaning results. For heavily soiled or large loads you may add more odex.\nHand washing: add 1\/8 cup odex per gallon of sudsy water for normal hand washing. Use little more odex for heavily soiled cloth. Use rubber gloves to protect your hands. \nGeneral cleaning and disinfecting:\nUse odex to clean and deodorize bathrooms and kitchens. It cleans by removing stains and killing germs that cause odors.\nToilets bowls: pour in 1\/2 cup of odex, brush entire bowl. Apply one drop of this solution to a hidden portion of fabric. Let stand for one minute, if there is no change in color, fabric can be safely bleached.\nAutomatic machine washing: one cup of odex per washing machine load with good laundry detergent should provide excellent cleaning results.
